item.title: New version: devel/nco version 5.0.6
item.description: The NCO toolkit manipulates and analyzes data stored in netCDF-accessible formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/antlr version 2.7.7
item.description: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/ocean version 2.9.7
item.description: OCEAN is a versatile and user-friendly package for calculating core edge spectroscopy including excitonic effects.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/spark version 3.2.1
item.description: Apache Sparkâ„¢ is a unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/hadoop version 3.3.1
item.description: The Apache Hadoop software library is a framework that allows for the distributed processing of large data sets across clusters of computers using simple programming models.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-pybedtools version 0.9.0_py39
item.description: Pybedtools wraps and extends BEDTools and offers feature-level manipulations from within Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-pysam version 0.18.0_py39
item.description: Pysam is a python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/htslib version 1.14
item.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/bedtools version 2.30.0
item.description: The bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-biopython version 1.79_py36
item.description: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation written in Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-biopython version 1.79_py39
item.description: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation written in Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/dcm2niix version 1.0.20211006
item.description: dcm2niix is a program esigned to convert neuroimaging data from the DICOM format to the NIfTI format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-globus-cli version 3.2.0_py36
item.description: A command line wrapper over the Globus SDK for Python.

item.description: A command line wrapper over the Globus SDK for Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/bart version 0.7.00
item.description: BART is a toolbox for Computational Magnetic Resonance Imaging.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/tetgen version 1.6.0
item.description: TetGen provides various features to generate good quality and adaptive tetrahedral meshes suitable for numerical methods, such as finite element or finite volume methods.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/py-namaster version 1.2.2_py36
item.description: NaMaster is a C library, Python module and standalone program to compute full-sky angular cross-power spectra of masked fields with arbitrary spin and an arbitrary number of known contaminants using a pseudo-Cl (aka MASTER) approach.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ffmpeg version 5.0
item.description: FFmpeg is the leading multimedia framework, able to decode, encode, transcode, mux, demux, stream, filter and play pretty much anything that humans and machines have created.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/gdal version 3.4.1
item.description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/R version 4.1.2
item.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/proj version 8.2.1
item.description: proj.4 is a standard UNIX filter function which converts geographic longitude and latitude coordinates into cartesian coordinates (and vice versa.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/sqlite version 3.37.2
item.description: SQLite is a self-contained, high-reliability, embedded, full-featured, public-domain, SQL database engine.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/netcdf version 4.8.1
item.description: NetCDF is a set of software libraries and self-describing, machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and sharing of array-oriented scientific data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/curl version 7.81.0
item.description: curl is an open source command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/openssl version 3.0.1
item.description: OpenSSL is a full-featured toolkit for general-purpose cryptography and secure communication.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-scanpy version 1.8.2_py39
item.description: Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-scikit-learn version 1.0.2_py39
item.description: Scikit-learn is a free software machine learning library for the Python programming language.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-numba version 0.54.1_py39
item.description: Numba is a compiler for Python array and numerical functions that gives you the power to speed up your applications with high performance functions written directly in Python..
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-gym version 0.21.0_py39
item.description: Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/mpifileutils version 0.11
item.description: mpiFileUtils is a suite of MPI-based tools to manage large datasets, which may vary from large directory trees to large files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/libarchive version 3.5.2
item.description: The libarchive project develops a portable, efficient C library that can read and write streaming archives in a variety of formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/lwgrp version 1.0.4
item.description: The Light-weight Group Library provides methods for MPI codes to quickly create and destroy process groups.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/libcircle version 0.3.0
item.description: libcircle is an API for distributing embarrassingly parallel workloads using self-stabilization.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
